## Data
Write something about where I got the data from.

### Load Packages

```{r loadlib, echo=TRUE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}

library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(readxl)
library(knitr)
```

### Import the Data

```{r import}
#load data from excel file
rawdata <- read_excel(here::here("raw_data", "raw_data.xlsx"))

#this is a sanity check to inspect the data after new name assignment
print(rawdata)


#reassigning column names to remain empty after automatic assignment of "...1"
colnames(rawdata) <- ifelse(colnames(rawdata) == "...1", "", colnames(rawdata))

#render the table with kable
kable(rawdata, format = "markdown")

```
